name: Gemini
temple_description:
Gemini is a special goddess transformed from one of the zodiac constellations. 
Originally lacking divine power, she was granted deification for her valor in 
endless wars. Both black and white sides of Gemini possess powerful and 
contrasting skills. The white embodies order, while the black unleashes chaos. 
Both personalities are extreme and changeable.

active_skills.name: Phantom Twins (Twin's Embrace)
active_skills.effect:
If Gemini's HP is above 50%, releases [Outward], dealing 200% M.DMG that 
ignores all M.RES and shields to all enemies. 
If Gemini's HP is below 50%, releases [Inward], dealing 150% M.DMG to 
all enemies, and 100% of the damage dealt is converted into HP.

active_skills.name: Divergent Fates (Intertwined Fates)
active_skills.effect:
Attacks the enemy with the highest ATK, causing 500% M.DMG. 
- If Gemini's ATK is higher than the enemy's, triggers [Yang], dealing an 
  additional 500% M.DMG that ignores shields. 
- If Gemini's ATK is lower, triggers [Yin], applying [Weaken] for 1 round, 
  reducing the enemy's ATK by the same amount as Gemini's ATK. 
  If [Weaken] fails, deals an extra 250% M.DMG. 
  (Wonâ€™t trigger additional damage if the enemy dies.)

exclusive_ur+_skill.name: Stellar Twin
exclusive_ur+_skill.effect:
When attacking a shielded target, deals True DMG equal to 25% of her ATK 
that ignores shields. 50% of the DMG dealt is converted into a shield for 
2 rounds. 
If Gemini starts in the main lineup, she gains [Bright Light] for 2 rounds. 
Otherwise, when entering combat, she gains [Dark Shadow] for 2 rounds.

[Bright Light]: Increases Gemini's DMG by 40% and CRIT by 30%. 
[Dark Shadow]: Increases Gemini's Debuff RES by 50% and Damage Reduction by 20%.
